description: I. Consultation; refusing entry or stay to NHS debtors. A public consultation around proposed changes to the immigration rules. Feb 2010. Incl. annex. 20 p. II. Impact assessment of proposed amendments to the immigration rules: refusing entry or extensions of stay to NHS debtors. 7 Dec 2009. 14 p. III. Equality impact assessment: Immigration control action against overseas visitors with outstanding NHS debts. 9 p.
